translations: 搀柠檬汁的啤酒；一种搀干姜汁麦酒

sentences.sentence: You told them, Shandy, you told them were I was!
sentences.translation: 你竟然告诉他们，姗蒂，你竟然告诉他们我在这！

sentences.sentence: Shandy lay on her side, one eye looking at him. She didn't seem convinced.
sentences.translation: 姗蒂侧躺着，用一只眼睛看着他，她好像听不懂他的话。

sentences.sentence: You told them, Shandy, you told them were I was! Tears poured down his face.
sentences.translation: “你竟然告诉他们，姗蒂，你竟然告诉他们我在这！”他的脸庞滚动着泪水。
